go_data.justification: p50 is part of the dynactin complex, which is involved in intracellular processes and membrane organelle distribution, suggesting it is located in the cytoplasm.
p50 interacts with other subunits of the dynactin complex, such as p150Glued, indicating it has protein binding capabilities.
Overexpression of p50 disrupts dynein-dependent maintenance of membrane organelle distribution, suggesting it plays a role in cytoskeleton organization.
